homelab.name: truenas
homelab.description: Manage TrueNAS system status and control apps - check system health, resources, and storage pools, or start, stop, and restart applications.
homelab.author: cmac86

media.name: radarr
media.description: Manage Radarr movies - view upcoming releases and search your library.
media.author: cmac86

media.name: sonarr
media.description: Manage Sonarr TV shows - view upcoming episodes and search your library.
voice_triggers: What TV shows are coming up?
Search for Breaking Bad on Sonarr
media.author: cmac86

media.name: youtube
media.description: Manage YouTube with comprehensive search, channel/video information retrieval, subscription management, and video rating capabilities.
voice_triggers: Search for Python tutorials on YouTube
How many subscribers does MrBeast have?
media.author: AbdulShahzeb

productivity.name: gmail
productivity.description: Manage Gmail - check unread emails and send messages.
voice_triggers: Do I have any new emails?
productivity.author: cmac86

productivity.name: google-calendar
productivity.description: Manage Google Calendar events - view, create, and delete events with support for timed and all-day events.
productivity.author: cmac86

productivity.name: google-contacts
productivity.description: Search and list Google Contacts with support for filtering by name and retrieving contact details including emails and phone numbers.
productivity.author: cmac86

productivity.name: google-tasks
productivity.description: Manage Google Tasks - get, add, complete, and delete tasks with optional due dates and notes.
productivity.author: cmac86

productivity.name: notion-tasks
productivity.description: Manage tasks in Notion - get, add, complete, and delete tasks with support for due dates and filtering.
voice_triggers: What's on my Notion task list?
Add task buy groceries due Friday
productivity.author: cmac86

productivity.name: paperless-ngx
productivity.description: Manage documents, search archives, and update metadata in Paperless-ngx document management system.
voice_triggers: Show me recent documents in paperless
Show documents from correspondent John Doe
productivity.author: JdCpuWiz

social.name: x-twitter
social.description: X (Twitter) automation: post tweets, like/retweet/delete, send DMs, lookup users with connection status and full metrics, mute users, and view blocked accounts. Requires X Developer account with API access.
voice_triggers: Post a tweet saying hello world
How many followers does Elon Musk have?
Send a DM to AbShahzeb saying great work
Does Sam Altman follow me on X?
social.author: AbdulShahzeb

sports.name: espn-epl
sports.description: Get Premier League scores, standings, and team schedules from ESPN.
voice_triggers: What are the Premier League scores?
Where is Arsenal in the table?
sports.author: cmac86

sports.name: espn-f1
sports.description: Get Formula 1 race results, schedule, and driver standings from ESPN.
voice_triggers: Who won the last F1 race?
sports.author: cmac86

sports.name: espn-mls
sports.description: Get MLS scores, schedules, and standings with optional team and conference filtering.
voice_triggers: When do the Sounders play next?
sports.author: cmac86

sports.name: espn-nba
sports.description: Get NBA scores, standings, and team schedules from ESPN.
voice_triggers: What are the NBA scores today?
Where are the Lakers in the standings?
sports.author: cmac86

sports.name: espn-nfl
sports.description: Get NFL scores, team schedules, and standings from ESPN.
voice_triggers: When do the Seahawks play next?
sports.author: cmac86

sports.name: espn-nhl
sports.description: Get NHL scores, schedules, and standings with optional team filtering.
voice_triggers: When do the Canucks play next?
sports.author: cmac86

utilities.name: weather-aus
utilities.description: Get Australian weather forecasts or current conditions for any city, suburb, or postcode.
voice_triggers: Give me the forecast for Melbourne
utilities.author: AbdulShahzeb

utilities.name: weather-can
utilities.description: Gets weather forecasts and current conditions for Canadian cities using Environment Canada official data.
utilities.author: cmac86

utilities.name: weather-fra
utilities.description: Gets current weather conditions and forecast data for French cities using the Open-Meteo API.
utilities.author: mmaudet

utilities.name: weather-us
utilities.description: Gets weather forecasts and current conditions for US cities using NOAA Weather.gov official data. Supports voice queries with automatic location geocoding via OpenStreetMap Nominatim.
voice_triggers: What's the current weather in Seattle?
utilities.author: JdCpuWiz
